title: A Providential Antisemitism by William O. Oldson [EPUB] [PDF]
description:
Title: A Providential Antisemitism: Nationalism and Polity in Nineteenth Century Romania
Author: William O. Oldson
Category: Academic
Series: Memoirs of the American Philosophical Society
Paperback: 177 pages
Publisher: Amer Philosophical Society (May 1991)
Language: English
ISBN-10: 0871691930
ISBN-13: 978-0871691934

This upload is for my friend  Anette14, a hard worker on and off KAT and a true scholar. Please support her excellent academic uploads as well. :-)

Synopsis from Abebooks.com: A scholarly examination of Romania's treatment of its Jewish population with an emphasis on nineteenth-century politics (Congress of Berlin) & intellectual decisions that affected twentieth-century policies--especially Romania's attitude towards Germany. Although called "the most anti-Semitic country in Europe," why did Romania's Jews survive the Holocaust in greater numbers than others?

This folder contains both the original PDF - which is browseable and searchable - as well as the converted EPUB from Calibre, which is certainly readable on a tablet or similar device but has formatting issues due to the original being a scanned copy of the book itself. The generated metadata.opf file and front cover are also included. Please seed and enjoy! :-)
